name: Cube Life: Island Survival
description: Cube Life: Island Survival is the first block building open-world survival game for the Wii Uâ„¢. Imagine being stranded on a beautiful deserted island... All of life's necessities: Food, water, shelter - all of your everyday needs are now gone, and it's up to you to survive. Cannibals and wild animals will not make it any easier on you. You'll need to explore, build, and craft to stay alive. In Creative Mode, the game will allow players to build constructions in 3D generated game worlds. There is no limit to your imagination. In Survival Mode, the player must maintain health, explore caves, gather resources, and craft tools on an unknown island. Get food, explore and build during the day. Hide, fight, and surive as night falls on the island. Current Feature: - Block building open-world - Creative Mode - Survival Mode - Multiplayer - Day/Night cycles - Crafting - Trading - 300+ Items and Tools - Explosives - Pets - Wild animals - Realistic graphical effects like water reflections and sunbeams - Optimized cube rendering 30+fps - Internet Rankings - Updates - the game will keep getting better and better!
